org.mitre.openid.connect.exception

类 ValidationException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • org.mitre.openid.connect.exception.ValidationException
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable

    public class ValidationException
extends Exception
    Thrown by utility methods when a client fails to validate. Contains information to be returned.
    作者:
    jricher
